english.segment1: Can I take you back to see my old days?. When I walked alone, With my flesh and bone. Can I take you back to see my old ways?. Life so cruel, I played the fool
english.segment3: I've lost my way. I've been lead astray. I've walked this path so many times (2x)
english.segment4: Can I take you back to see my old face?. Beaten and bruised, Used and abused. Can I take you back to see my old heart?. So full of hate, Blood contaminate
english.segment6: I've lost my way. I've been lead astray. I've walked this path so many times (2x)
english.segment7: I'm never alone. I'm coming back (I'm coming back). I'm never alone (4x)
